channel.title: NYC – Steven Chu – Photographer & Visual Experience Designer New York
channel.description: The culture of New York, shaped through photography, iconic brand development, and community building in nightlife.

item.title: The Meatpacking, New York City
item.dc:creator: Steven Chu
item.description: This is NYC seen through my eyes in my early 20’s. In the meatpacking district- Restaurant Florent […]
item.content:encoded: This is NYC seen through my eyes in my early 20’s. In the meatpacking district- Restaurant Florent was still there, the High Line was still train-track wilderness, and Dior Homme by Hedi Slimane was all the rage. These are outtakes from unofficial shoots I dug up from my archives. #tbt
